channel.title: Ace Combat Infinity- AC goes F2P
channel.description:
I tried the beta a few months ago- the game felt very similar to Ace Combat 6 in terms of plane handling, graphical horsepower, and such. Set in an alternate history present, the Earth got pelted with a shitton of meteors, and only certain areas managed to get through it because of a giant array of massive railguns. Somehow. It's explained in the storyline- yes, a full on single player story is accessible from Ace Infinity, but you have to expend fuel tanks to play it. (There is an option to buy unlimited story access for $20, which is not a bad deal considering Ace 6 set people back $60.)
Anyway, [url='https://www.acecombat-infinity.com/']it's out now.[/url] Surprisingly little fanfare- I was hoping to see a bit more marketing with this one. Figured I'd spread the word here because I'd love to find some people to play with.

item.title: Ace Combat Infinity- AC goes F2P
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I tried the beta a few months ago- the game felt very similar to Ace Combat 6 in terms of plane handling, graphical horsepower, and such. Set in an alternate history present, the Earth got pelted with a shitton of meteors, and only certain areas managed to get through it because of a giant array of massive railguns. Somehow. It’s explained in the storyline- yes, a full on single player story is accessible from Ace Infinity, but you have to expend fuel tanks to play it. (There is an option to buy unlimited story access for $20, which is not a bad deal considering Ace 6 set people back $60.)

Anyway, it’s out now. Surprisingly little fanfare- I was hoping to see a bit more marketing with this one. Figured I’d spread the word here because I’d love to find some people to play with.
